description: The Farmers Bank of Appomattox provides personal and business banking products and services. Its deposit products include checking and savings accounts, individual retirement accounts, and certificates of deposit. The company's loan portfolio comprises auto, personal, mortgage, agricultural, equipment, and commercial real estate loans, as well as commercial credit lines. In addition, it offers check, credit, and gift cards, as well as safe deposit box, ATM, cash management, merchant/night deposit, Internet banking, mobile banking, wire transfer, overdraft protection, cashier's check, and savings bonds redemption services. The company serves customers located in the Counties of Appomattox, Buckingham, Campbell, and Prince Edward, Virginia. The Farmers Bank of Appomattox was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Appomattox, Virginia.
